column1: Go to Products > Categories (Level 1) > WeltPixel Mega Menu
column2: Go to Products > Categories (Level 1) > WeltPixel Mega Menu

column1: You will be able to configure a different display mode for each category:
column2: You will be able to configure a different display mode for each category:

column1: Menu display mode for each level 1 category: Full Width / Sectioned / Boxed / Default Magento
column2: Menu display mode for each level 1 category: Full Width / Sectioned / Boxed / Default Magento

column1: Number of columns for each category menu
column2: Number of columns for each category menu

column1: Add CMS blocks or custom HTML to categories - Top / Left / Right / Bottom
column2: Add CMS blocks or custom HTML to categories - Top / Left / Right / Bottom

column1: Control visibility for mobile Link “ALL [category name]” at category level
column2: Control visibility for mobile Link “ALL [category name]” at category level

column1: Go to Products > Categories (any) > WeltPixel Options
column2: Go to Products > Categories (any) > WeltPixel Options

column1: Custom Link - set a custom link for any category in the menu
column2: Custom Link - set a custom link for any category in the menu

column1: Open in new tab - opens the custom link/category page in new tab
column2: Open in new tab - opens the custom link/category page in new tab

column1:
1. Use 'http://' or 'https://' to create external link
2. Use '/' to create link to home page
3. Use '#' to disable link
column2:
1. Use 'http://' or 'https://' to create external link
2. Use '/' to create link to home page
3. Use '#' to disable link

column1: Number of columns in dropdown menu
column2: Number of columns in dropdown menu

column1: Only applies for "Full Width" and "Sectioned" display modes.
